884890.name: Squirgle Original Soundtrack
884890.description:
Planar Gazer is proud to present the original soundtrack to Squirgle, all tracks of which are in the lossless FLAC format.

All compositions by NaN.

Track Listing

  • 1. Theme from Squirgle (2:19)
  • 2. Pointillism (2:31)
  • 3. Lineage (3:36)
  • 4. Tri the Waltz (2:09)
  • 5. Squared Off (1:43)
  • 6. Pent Up (3:48)
  • 7. Hexidecibel (2:08)
  • 8. Interseptor (2:31)
  • 9. Roctopus (2:48)
  • 10. Nonplussed (4:18)

Accolades

  • "Brought genuine tears to my eyes." - NaN's mom
  • "Categorically imperative." - Immanuel Kant
  • "I can't believe...listen to this!" - Focus tester
  • "Please implement a volume option." - QA team, early in development
